entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Burgeo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:05 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burgeo 10:30 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: -12.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -18.8°C
Wind: NNW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16 except minus 23 inland.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 16 except minus 23 inland. Wind chill minus 23 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023
